extensionDescription.message: Jumps from an OpenStreetMap-compatible website to another one, preserving some contextual information.

loading_firstLine.description: Shown in popup shortly before menu appears

loading_secondLine.message: If this does not stop loading, reload the page and try again.
loading_secondLine.description: Shown in popup shortly before menu appears.

error_noAccess.message: ERROR: Could not find page or did not have permission to access it.
error_noAccess.description: Error shown when the current page cannot be accessed (technical exception)

error_unknownWebsite.message: ERROR: Current site was not recognized. If you believe it should have been recognized, you can request this in $EXTENSION_SITE$.
error_unknownWebsite.description: Error shown when current page is not recognized

error_noInformationExtracted.message: ERROR: The website was recognized, but it's parameters were not understood. If you believe this is a bug, please report it in $EXTENSION_SITE$.
error_noInformationExtracted.description: Error shown when no parameters were found in the current page

site_howdidyoucontribute.message: How did you contribute to OSM?
